1. General

1.1 Acceptance of Terms
By using this school event management application (hereinafter referred to as the “Service”), you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use, as well as by the internal rules and regulations in force within the institution.

1.2 Eligibility
Access to the Service is limited to students, teachers, administrative staff, and authorized personnel of the higher education institution. Users must have a valid account provided or approved by the institution.

1.3 Modification of Terms
The institution reserves the right to modify or update these Terms at any time. Any changes will be published within the application. Continued use of the Service after the changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms. It is the user’s responsibility to review this section regularly.

2. Services and Availability

2.2 Availability of Events and Services
All events, activities, and services displayed in the application are subject to availability and administrative approval, as well as organizational constraints. The institution reserves the right to cancel, postpone, or modify any event without prior notice.
